name: Cat Chaos (Jentin)
description:
A hastily made game for Brackeys 2021.2 week long jam.

Andrew is a cat whos friends have been arrested and its up to him to free them.  How far will you go to save them. Cause chaos (in the forms of Arson, alien abductions, and birthday party crashing) throughout the guard's strongholds to distract them so you can free your friends. 

There are still some bugs that I am going to try to fix before the jam ends, no promises.
